import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const HomestayDetails = ({ onSearch, chatbotVisible }) => { const [showMore, setShowMore] = useState(false); const toggleShowMore = () => { setShowMore(!showMore); }; return (

Namgay Zam Homestay

{/* Star review svg */} 2 reviews {/* location */}

Punakha, Bhutan

Entire place is hosted by Leki

3 bedrooms

6 beds

Shared bathroom

About

Home away from home and a place where you can experience Bhutanese way of living. The host loves to talk to you and share your travel experience. The owner is a simple villager and learning from guest about the outside world makes her extremely happy. You can judge by her eyes beaming as you go on narrating the travel experience. Her local wine (Ara) brewed with her own hands is a must-try and she will offer your till you can stand no more. If you all would like to try her wine, do not hesitate to ask her!!!

{!showMore && ( )} {showMore && ( )} {/* special facitlities */}

Facilities

Shared hot tub

Free parking

Pets allowed

Breakfast & Dinner

Mini Fridge

No Wifi

No lock on bedroom door

); }; export default HomestayDetails;
